# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_CAN_ONLY_BE_DAMAGED_BY_SCRIPT_PARTICIPANTS

## Summary
Sets that the entity can only be damaged by players running the script this entity belongs to

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** onlyDamagedWhenRunningScript
